lead_paragraph: Daniele Bennati of Italy won his second stage of the Vuelta a España, outracing his countrymen Paolo Bettini and Alessandro Petacchi in the final yards in Talavera de la Reina. Denis Menchov of Russia kept his overall lead by 2 minutes 1 second.
snippet: Daniele Bennati of Italy won his second stage of the Vuelta a España, outracing his countrymen Paolo Bettini and Alessandro Petacchi in the final yards in Talavera de la Reina. Denis Menchov of Russia kept his overall lead by 2 minutes 1 second.
